text.jpText:
さーてと。
みんなはどこに隠れたかな～？
text.enText: Well, let's see. Where did everyone hide～?

text.jpText:
マヤノもマーベラスも隠れるのに
すぐ飽きそうだから――
text.enText:
Mayano and Marvelous are both going to get 
tired of hiding.

text.jpText:
隠れるなら、暇つぶしができる
購買かカフェかな！
text.enText:
If I'm going to hide, maybe I'll go to a 
purchase or a cafe where I can kill some time!

text.jpText:
よーし！　テイオー様はかくれんぼでも
強いってとこ、見せてやるぞー♪
text.enText:
All right! Let's show Teio-sama that we are 
strong even in hide-and-seek!
